Lift bale onto pallet or platform

subtasks: Setup sprayer with appropriate nozzles and pressure
Drive sprayer slowly along crop rows, overlapping passes for coverage
Check nozzle settings for uniform application

Drive to hay storage area and place net
Unwind net to cover stored hay and secure edges
Adjust sprayer for appropriate droplet size and coverage

Monitor sprayer performance and check operation intervals

Check spark plugs, filters, and hydraulic systems
Inspect tires and replace worn ones

tasks.task: Tend to livestock during stormy weather
subtasks: Ensure water and feed access remain available
Check for drainage issues and prevent flooding
Monitor animal behavior for signs of stress

tasks.task: Monitor and calibrate grain moisture meter
subtasks: Test grain samples to determine moisture content
Adjust heat tapes or fan systems to correct moisture levels
Regularly inspect grain storage for mold or insect activity
Analyze data from moisture meters to optimize drying processes

tasks.task: Survey fields for new irrigation installation
subtasks: Walk through fields to assess necessary pipeline layout
Map feasibility areas and estimate water access points
Consult with engineering team for design considerations

tasks.task: Conduct detailed soil analysis in lab
subtasks: Receive soil test results and interpret data
Compare results with historical records and soil maps
Develop nutrient management plan based on analysis
Adjust fertilizer applications accordingly and document changes

tasks.task: Start irrigation system in the evening
subtasks: Check the weather for conditions favorable for late-night watering
Set timers on the irrigation system to operate during cooler hours
Monitor the system for any unexpected malfunctions during the night
Verify that morning dew has evaporated before assessing coverage

tasks.task: Talk to Deere representative about equipment pricing
subtasks: Review product brochures and demo how the equipment would operate
Discuss payment plans for purchasing new tractors or harvesters
Ask questions about the latest agricultural technology and upgrades

Remove debris and build-up from screens and vents

Check for leaks and even coverage
Remove uneaten feed to prevent waste
Drive grain truck to storage area
Transfer grain using conveyor belt or auger
